headline: Polypropylene Cups Earn Widely Recyclable Designation, Expanding Access to Curbside Recycling Nationwide
summary: NEW YORK, February 02, 2026--More communities across the U.S. can now recycle cold to‑go cups, marking a major step toward reducing waste and building a more circular future. Thanks to the leadership of How2Recycle®, NextGen Consortium managed by Closed Loop Partners’ Center for the Circular Economy, The Recycling Partnership, Starbucks and WM, to‑go cups are entering a new era of recyclability.

thumbnail.caption: A polypropylene cup is distributed into a curbside recycling bin.
